name: affenpinscher dog
description: En lille hund med stort temperament og cheeky personlighed. Affenpinschers er åbne og selvsikre, perfekte for dem der elsker små hunde med stor attitude. De har brug for regelmæssig grooming og elsker at være i centrum.

name: afghan hound dog
description: An elegant and graceful dog known for their long, silky coat. Afghan Hounds are independent thinkers with a gentle nature. They require significant grooming commitment and enjoy being pampered.

name: airedale terrier dog
description: The king of terriers! Airedales are intelligent, energetic, and loyal companions. They're great with families and need plenty of exercise and mental stimulation. Their wiry coat requires regular grooming.

name: akita dog
description: A large and powerful dog with a calm, dignified demeanor. Akitas are deeply loyal to their families and make excellent guardians. They require experienced owners and proper socialization from an early age.

name: alaskan malamute dog
description: A giant, friendly giant bred for hauling heavy loads. Alaskan Malamutes are incredibly strong and affectionate, loving their families deeply. They shed heavily and need consistent exercise and training.

name: alpine dachsbracke dog
description: A small but sturdy mountain hunting dog from the Alps. Alpine Dachsbrackes are friendly and tireless, with a keen sense of smell. They're ideal for active families who enjoy outdoor adventures.

name: american akita dog
description: A more heavily built version of the Akita breed. American Akitas are strong, independent, and loyal to their families. They need firm, consistent training and aren't suitable for first-time dog owners.

name: american cocker spaniel dog
description: A loving and eager-to-please dog with a beautiful flowing coat. American Cocker Spaniels are wonderful family pets and excellent therapy dogs. They need regular grooming and enjoy an active lifestyle.

name: american foxhound dog
description: A hardy and athletic hunting dog with great endurance. American Foxhounds are friendly and pack-oriented. They have a strong prey drive and do well with active families or running partners.

name: american staffordshire terrier dog
description: A strong and courageous dog with a muscular build. American Staffordshire Terriers are loyal family members who love their people. They need firm training and positive socialization to be wonderful companions.

name: american water spaniel dog
description: Wisconsin's state dog! American Water Spaniels are intelligent, eager hunters with a love for water. They're wonderful family dogs and enjoy both work and play. Regular grooming and exercise keep them happy.

name: appenzell cattle dog
description: A tricolored working dog from the Swiss Alps. Appenzell Cattle Dogs are energetic, alert, and loyal. They're excellent for active families and require both physical and mental stimulation.

name: ariege pointing dog
description: A French hunting dog known for its excellent hunting abilities and calm nature. Ariege Pointers are devoted to their families and make wonderful companions for active households. They thrive on outdoor activities.

name: ariegeois dog
description: An elegant French hound with a gentle and friendly disposition. Ariegeois dogs are pack hunters by nature but make loving family members. They enjoy both work and companionship with their loved ones.

name: artois hound dog
description: A French pack hound known for its hunting prowess and friendly nature. Artois Hounds are sturdy and determined, making excellent companions for active families who appreciate traditional hunting dog breeds.

name: atlas mountain dog (aidi)
description: A powerful guardian dog from the Moroccan Atlas Mountains. Aidis are protective, loyal, and independent. They're excellent guardians for families but need experienced owners and proper socialization.

name: australian cattle dog
description: An intelligent and energetic herding dog full of personality. Australian Cattle Dogs are loyal to their families and need plenty of mental and physical activity. They're perfect for active, engaged owners.

name: australian kelpie dog
description: A tireless and intelligent working dog bred for herding. Kelpies are incredibly agile and responsive, thriving in active environments. They excel in dog sports and need constant engagement.

name: australian shepherd dog
description: Despite the name, developed in the American West. Australian Shepherds are intelligent, loyal, and energetic. They're excellent family dogs for active households and excel in dog sports and training.

name: australian silky terrier dog
description: A small but spirited dog with a beautiful silky coat. Silky Terriers are friendly and responsive, making wonderful lap dogs. They enjoy playtime and require regular grooming to maintain their lustrous coat.

name: australian stumpy tail cattle dog
description: Similar to the Australian Cattle Dog but naturally bobtailed. Stumpys are energetic, loyal, and hardworking. They're great companions for families who can provide plenty of exercise and mental stimulation.

name: australian terrier dog
description: A small but feisty Australian dog with a bold personality. Australian Terriers are friendly, affectionate, and eager to please. They make excellent apartment dogs despite their spunky terrier temperament.

description: A medium-sized working dog from Austria known for alertness and loyalty. Austrian Pinschers are energetic and protective of their families. They need socialization and enjoy having a job to do.

name: austrian black and tan hound dog
description: A dedicated hunting hound from Austria with excellent tracking abilities. These hounds are tireless and determined, making them perfect for active hunters. They're affectionate with their families.

description: A Swiss dog with white coat and working heritage. White Swiss Shepherds are intelligent and devoted. They need consistent training and regular activity.

name: wire-haired pointing griffon korthals dog
description: A Dutch pointing dog with distinctive wire coat. Wire-haired Pointing Griffons are intelligent and devoted hunters. They make wonderful hunting and family companions.

name: wirehaired slovakian pointer dog
description: A Slovak hunting dog with a distinctive wire coat. Wirehaired Slovakian Pointers are determined and devoted. They make wonderful hunting companions.

name: xoloitzcuintle dog
description: A Mexican dog available in hairless and coated varieties. Xolos are loyal and affectionate. They make wonderful companions and require special skin care if hairless.

name: yakutian laika dog
description: A Russian sled dog known for endurance and loyalty. Yakutian Laikas are devoted to their families. They need experienced owners who understand their working heritage.

name: yorkshire terrier dog
description: A small English terrier with a long, silky coat. Yorkshire Terriers are spirited and devoted. They make wonderful companions for those seeking small, loyal dogs.

name: yugoslavian shepherd dog - sharplanina
description: A Balkan livestock guardian of large size. Sharplaninas are loyal and protective. They need experienced owners and proper socialization.
